item.title: Kauai Slideshow
item.description: I recently made a Hawaii video slideshow. Here is the link. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2DjEHWNTHQ0

item.title: Back in Myanmar Headed to Pa-Auk Meditation Center
item.description: [caption id=“attachment_697” align=“alignleft” width=“1920”] From the pamc lookout[/caption] I am back in Myanmar from Kauai, Hawaii. I will begin the Bus trip to Pa-Auk Meditation Center this morning. What a long transit back that was. Here is a picture taken from Pa-Auk Lookout point that friends and I had fun taking a while back. I will begin the Bus trip to Pa-Auk Meditation Center this morning.
